lead_paragraph: The 20 percent drop was partly offset by growth in subscriptions and digital advertising. Adjusted operating profit fell to $241 million in 2016, from $289 million.
snippet: The 20 percent drop was partly offset by growth in subscriptions and digital advertising. Adjusted operating profit fell to $241 million in 2016, from $289 million....

headline.main: New York Times Co.’s Decline in Print Advertising Tempered by Digital Gains
headline.print_headline: Gains in Digital Temper Times’s Print Ad Decline
